channel.title: iFuckingPK - Beta - Project
channel.description:
[b]iFuckingPk - Pking server[/b]
iFuckingPk aims to focus on pking, iFuckingPk will offer great combat, skills and minigames. The server will be played from a webclient.
This is the first server that I develop.
[b]Developers:[/b] Minhzor
I am currently looking for developers. Development team thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,446155.0.html
[b]Features:[/b]
[b]Skills:[/b] Melee(attack, strength and defense) Hitpoints Range Magic Prayer Agility Runecrafting Thieving Crafting Fletching Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Woodcutting
[b]Dueling [/b] -Rules -Staking
[b]Castlewars[/b] -Waiting room -Flags -Safe room
[b]Pest control[/b] -Portals -Rewards
[b]Barrows[/b] -Crypts -Tunnels -Chest
[b]Custom minigames[/b] Thinking of ideas
[b]Clan chat[/b] Working on the clan chat packet.
[b]Godwars[/b] -Full dungeon Need to: Import and add map and objects -All bosses Need to: Add guardians and minions
[b]Combat[/b] Melee following Mage following Range following Projectiles Blocking Multi barrage Special attacks
[b]Client features[/b] Added infinity icons Updated headicons Correct orb drawing Run orb hover and toggle Prayer and hp orb filling/depleting Friend tab Ignore tab Clan chat tab Options tab Emote tab Notes tab Quest tab Combat tab Skill tab Equipment tab Prayer tab Magic tab Sprite outlining New tabs and hovering New context menus New cursor and hover on World map hover
[b]Adding[/b] New animations Updated Npcs Item on death interface Experience lock button
[i][b]New interfaces[/b][/i]
[b]Equipment interface:[/b] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/nq3bbl.png[/img] [b]Magic interfaces:[/b] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2i9a3d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2mciwhu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/34io2ns.png[/img] [b]Bank:[/b] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/bgp6bl.png[/img] [b]Shop:[/b] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/30bg3d4.png[/img] [b]Multi icon:[/b] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2jc81ex.png[/img] [b]Logout screen:[/b] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/rmtvdf.png[/img] [b]Skill tab:[/b] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/24wsdbl.png[/img] [b]Trade:[/b] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/5ked0m.png[/img]
[b]Full prayer[/b] -Prayer switching -Protection prayers -Ranged prayers; sharp eye, hawk eye and eagle eye. -Magic prayers; mystic will, mystic lore and mystic might. -Chivarly and Piety Need to: Add correct prayer draining
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/34j7vyp.png[/img]
More soon...
